1.content: Fix appointment booking start_time constraint error
1.details: CRITICAL: Fix 'null value in column start_time violates not-null constraint' error when booking appointments. Check CitasPage.tsx appointment booking logic and ensure proper timestamp generation.

2.details: Users should be able to view event galleries when clicking on events on the main page. Create gallery view component and integrate with event data.

3.details: Investigate and fix why users cannot add documents in the affiliate section. Check file upload components and permissions.

4.details: 1. Test appointment booking works without errors 2. Test event gallery viewing 3. Test affiliate document upload 4. Ensure no regressions
